data.price: Na katika wao wapo wanao sema: Mola wetu Mlezi, tupe duniani mema, na Akhera mema, na utulinde na adhabu ya Moto!
data.arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَقُولُ رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِنَا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗ وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ حَسَنَةٗ وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
data.footnotes: Na wapo watu ambao Mwenyezi Mungu amewawezesha nyoyo zao zikapelekea kuomba kheri ya dunia na Akhera, na wakamwomba Mwenyezi Mungu awaepushe na shari na adhabu ya Moto.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yaqūlu rabbanā ātinā fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wafī al-ākhirati ḥasanatan waqinā ʿadhāba al-nāri

dua.name: Rabbana Atina
dua.verseTitle: The Comprehensive Dua for Worldly and Eternal Goodness
dua.significanceReason: This dua is one of the most beloved and frequently recited supplications in the Qur'an. It seeks goodness in both this world and the Hereafter, and protection from the punishment of the Fire. Its comprehensive nature makes it a powerful and versatile prayer for all aspects of life.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
